name: Mayan Slice
description:
Now FREE for a limited time!

Are you ready for an addictive new challenge from the creators of The Impossible Game? You'll need a steady hand and nerves of steel to slice apart the mysterious medallions.

FEATURES:
• Over 80 taxing levels
• Two endless arcade modes
• Game Center integration
• Support for iPhone 5

Enter the forgotten temples and test your skills in this stripped-back action game! Features beautiful digitally-painted artwork and an original soundtrack.

Do you have what it takes to uncover the Mayans' secrets?
